working.works: Sessions are conducted in an interactive manner, allowing participants to engage with instructors, ask questions, and participate in discussions related to the topics covered.

Participants are given hands-on exercises and assignments to complete during the trial period. These exercises give participants practical experience and help them gauge their interest and aptitude for the subject matter.
Throughout the trial period, designated Q&A sessions are held where participants can clarify doubts, seek guidance, and interact with instructors and fellow participants.
At the end of the trial period, participants are asked to provide feedback on their experience. This feedback helps in improving the content and delivery of future training programs.
Finally, participants are informed about the next steps they can take if they wish to continue their learning journey.
